scripts.build:ordered: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/cli && npm run build --workspace=packages/mcp-server && npm run build --workspace=packages/extension
scripts.package:mcp: mkdir -p dist/mcp && cd packages/mcp-server && npm pack --pack-destination ../../dist/mcp
scripts.package:extension: mkdir -p dist/extension && cd packages/extension && npm run package && mv *.vsix ../../dist/extension/
scripts.package:extension:next: mkdir -p dist/extension && cd packages/extension && npm run package:next && mv *prerelease.vsix ../../dist/extension/ 2>/dev/null; mv *.vsix ../../dist/extension/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package:all: npm run build:ordered && npm run package:mcp && npm run package:extension && mkdir -p dist && cp INSTALL.md dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && echo 'âœ… Distribution packages ready in dist/'
